channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- all products

item.description: In system service, there is a possible permission bypass due to a missing permission check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS06219064; Issue ID: ALPS06219064.

In mdp, there is a possible memory corruption due to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS05836642; Issue ID: ALPS05836642.
